overview: He undresses you with his eyes every time you walk into the room. He wants you and you know it. He takes you on a work trip and things get steamy at the pool. He gives you a ride on his helicopter and one thing leads to another. You're house-sitting for the boss and he comes home early. Your workout at the gym turns into something much, much more. These ladies know how to climb the corporate ladder. He may think he is in control, but she's holding all of the cards.
title: Seducing the Boss
